attributes.action: Call for a general election now, we have no confidence in this government.
attributes.additional_details: Austerity has not ended the economic slow down in the UK. The NHS is failing. We have more food banks than ever. While the population is tightening its belts the MPs get another pay rise.
attributes.background: We the people of this United Kingdom have no confidence in this government. They have not kept any election promises.
